meta.description: 文生图测试用例集 - 图像生成能力测评

cases.name: 全息投影会议室
cases.prompt: A futuristic holographic conference room with floating transparent displays showing 3D data visualizations, soft blue and purple ambient lighting, sleek metallic furniture, people interacting with holographic interfaces, photorealistic, cinematic composition, 8K quality

cases.name: 赛博朋克街景
cases.prompt: Cyberpunk city street at night, neon signs in Chinese and Japanese, rain-soaked streets reflecting colorful lights, flying vehicles in the background, street vendors with holographic menus, foggy atmosphere, cinematic lighting, highly detailed, 4K

cases.name: 古风少女
cases.prompt: Beautiful ancient Chinese girl in traditional hanfu dress, flowing silk fabric with floral patterns, elegant hair ornaments with jade and pearls, soft natural lighting, cherry blossoms in background, delicate facial features, oil painting style, high detail

cases.name: 太空站内部
cases.prompt: Interior of a massive space station, large observation windows showing Earth and stars, astronauts floating in zero gravity, holographic control panels, advanced technology, realistic lighting from both interior and space, cinematic composition, photorealistic

cases.name: 魔法森林
cases.prompt: Enchanted forest with giant glowing mushrooms, bioluminescent plants, floating magical particles in the air, mystical fog, ancient trees with twisted roots, fantasy atmosphere, vibrant colors, detailed vegetation, concept art style

cases.name: 产品设计-智能手表
cases.prompt: Modern smartwatch product shot, sleek metallic design, OLED display showing fitness data, minimalist interface, floating against gradient background, studio lighting with soft shadows, professional photography, high resolution, premium quality

cases.name: 龙在云端
cases.prompt: Majestic Chinese dragon flying through clouds, detailed scales with iridescent colors, golden horns and whiskers, dramatic sky with sun rays breaking through clouds, traditional Chinese art style mixed with photorealism, epic composition, 8K quality

cases.name: 现代建筑
cases.prompt: Modern minimalist architecture, white concrete building with large glass windows, geometric shapes, surrounded by reflecting pools, blue sky with few clouds, dramatic shadows, architectural photography style, high contrast, ultra-wide angle

cases.name: 美食摄影-拉面
cases.prompt: Japanese ramen bowl in close-up, steaming hot broth with rich tonkotsu color, perfectly cooked egg with runny yolk, fresh green onions, bamboo shoots, char siu pork slices, food photography with shallow depth of field, warm lighting, appetizing composition

cases.name: 水下世界
cases.prompt: Underwater coral reef scene, colorful tropical fish swimming among vibrant corals, sea turtles in the distance, sun rays penetrating water surface creating god rays effect, crystal clear turquoise water, National Geographic style, photorealistic, 4K quality
